Literature.Title: Human microbiome derived synthetic antimicrobial peptides with activity against Gram-negative, Gram-positive, and antibiotic resistant bacteria
Literature.Author: Mousa WK, Shaikh AY, Ghemrawi R, Aldulaimi M, Al Ali A, Sammani N, Khair M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.1µM),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313(MIC=1.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus BAA-2313(no activity data),Enterococcus faecium ATCC BAA-2317(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 33694(MIC=8.9µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-1744(MIC=9.5µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. arizonae ATCC 13314(no activity data),Clostridioides difficile ATCC 43602(MIC=1.6µM),Human lung carcinoma NCI-H292(EC50=2.97µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(EC50=6.35µM)
